findings.title: The initial value of the owner of UniversalBridgeImplementation cannot be set.
findings.description: The constructor function does not initialize the owner variable, making it impossible to set the initial value of the owner.

findings.title: Compile errors occur.
findings.description: In Solidity 0.5.x version, the reference type variable must have an explicitly specified data location (storage, memory, calldata) for array parameters in functions PriceOracleV1#setUnderlyingPrices() and PriceOracleV1#setDirectPrices(). Additionally, a compile error occurs due to importing non-existent contract Comp.sol.
